name: agent-playground
description: A development environment for the Agent Playground project.
author: Tom Kirkpatrick <tom@kirk patrick.me>

scripts.postinstall: npx rulesync install --frozen && npx rulesync generate --delete
scripts.rulesync:update: npx rulesync install --update && npx rulesync generate --delete

simple-git-hooks.post-merge: npx rulesync install --frozen && npx rulesync generate --delete
simple-git-hooks.post-checkout: npx rulesync install --frozen && npx rulesync generate --delete
